channel.title: OMFG help
channel.description: ok so i have this for PATH %SystemRoot%\system32;%SystemRoot%;%SystemRoot%\System32\Wbem and no classpath and sialbs work but on my bros comp he has the classpath and path taharok posted and it wont work. how do i fix this i get connection error

item.title: OMFG help
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Or use something from my runserver…
Try:

@echo off set CLASSPATH= javac *.java pause
Not so sure because I’ve never tried it :s

item.title: OMFG help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

do what i did if your smart with bit of computer knolegde…you my do this but if ur relying on posts alone to give you all the codes its best to leave it but! if you dont here is what u can do

ok i know ur talking baout enviormnt vauribles even though you didnt even tell us…-.- anyways wen u download jdk its best to wen u come to the screen were u put ur jdk change it to a new folder called jdk so you dont loose it =) that makes the code shorter for you ma brotha =D heres thge path and class patehr for if tou do this

classpath CLASSPATH=C:\jdk\bin;.;%classpath%;

now for the path

 C:\jdk\bin\;.;

that should help =) also some computer reqire u put the ;.; aftr it that migth help lso =) hope i helped =P[br][size=1]Posted on: September 29, 2007, 01:54:01 PM[/size][hr]i had so many typos in my post >.< i wanted to post before someone posted about it =P
